title: Элемент для списка статей из хаба Отдела временной безошибочности
source:
[[a class="stand" href="{$address}"]]
    [[image glasses_cooll.svg class="stand-bg"]]\
[[module ListPages fullname="{$address}"]]
[[div class="titled"]]
+ %%title%%
[[/div]]
[[span class="rating"]] [[image https://files.scpfoundation.net/local--files/fragment:quiet-list/star-full.svg]] %%rating%% (%%rating_votes%%)[[/span]]
[[span class="author"]]Автор: %%created_by%% [[if {$collab}]] {$collab} [[/if]][[/span]]
----
[[div class="description"]]
{$desc}
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/a]]
